name: SCAVENGER (itch) (The Punk Wrangler)
description:
You are a scavenger.

You have returned to the city at a most dangerous time. 

The Things will be moving about during this frigid weather. 

Find an artifact and get home. 

~~~

An old writing project and my first ever Twine game made about 5 years ago. Now it finally comes to Itch for the world to see. Enjoy!
